column2:
Star Man arrived at CentOZ Shrine.
After searching the surroundings, he spotted the old woman.
"Have you ever heard the term 'Red Man'?"
"When a ghost and a monster fuse, a completely red human is born."
"But I've heard the red person dies after a week."
"If you know any way to stop them from dying within a week, please tell me."

"I see... Even if it seems unrelated,
any bit of information you have could help—please tell me."
Star Man thanked the old woman and headed back to the sea‑cave.
